quotes.message: Injustice never rules forever.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.message: Gender injustice is a social impairment and therefore has to be corrected in social attitudes and behaviour.
quotes.name: Mohammad Hamid Ansari

quotes.message: Injustice in the end produces independence.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Those who commit injustice bear the greatest burden.
quotes.name: Hosea Ballou

quotes.message: You can only watch injustice go on for so long until you're compelled to say something. To speak out against it.
quotes.name: Macklemore

quotes.message: Injustice is censured because the censures are afraid of suffering, and not from any fear which they have of doing injustice.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: If thou suffer injustice, console thyself; the true unhappiness is in doing it.
quotes.name: Democritus

quotes.message: Nothing can make injustice just but mercy.
quotes.name: Robert Frost

quotes.message: Injustice is relatively easy to bear; what sting is justice.
quotes.name: H. L. Mencken

quotes.message: Every social injustice is not only cruel, but it is economic waste.
quotes.name: William Feather

quotes.message: Injustice boils in men's hearts as does steel in its cauldron, ready to pour forth, white hot, in the fullness of time.
quotes.name: Mother Jones

quotes.message: It seems to me that an unjust law is no law at all.
quotes.name: Saint Augustine

quotes.message: Since when do we have to agree with people to defend them from injustice?
quotes.name: Lillian Hellman

quotes.message: If you look at any other group of people suffering injustice, women are always in the worst situation within that group.
quotes.name: Salma Hayek

quotes.message: I think people should be angry at things that are worthy of anger. Injustice is outrageous and deserves outrage.
quotes.name: Chris Hayes

quotes.message: Injustice can never be stood for.
quotes.name: Amber Heard

quotes.message: The moment that justice must be paid for by the victim of injustice it becomes itself injustice.
quotes.name: Benjamin Tucker

quotes.message: The greatest injustice in the world is to bring a child into the world, and not be able to offer it peace.
quotes.name: Nafisa Joseph

quotes.message: He who commits injustice is ever made more wretched than he who suffers it.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: Fight injustice, that our children might be blessed.
quotes.name: Rick Perlstein

quotes.message: The glaring injustice is there for all who are not blinded by prejudice to see.
quotes.name: Bram Fischer

quotes.message: Fighting injustice keeps you young.
quotes.name: Gloria Allred

quotes.message: There is not a single injustice in Northern Ireland that is worth the loss of a single British soldier or a single Irish citizen either.
quotes.name: James Callaghan

quotes.message: The injustice done to an individual is sometimes of service to the public.
quotes.name: Junius

quotes.message: People don't always get what they deserve in this world.
quotes.name: Lemony Snicket

quotes.message: I guess the only time most people think about injustice is when it happens to them
quotes.name: Charles Bukowski

quotes.message: If the misery of the poor be caused not by the laws of nature, but by our institutions, great is our sin.
quotes.name: Charles Darwin

quotes.message: An unjust law is itself a species of violence. Arrest for its breach is more so.
quotes.name: Mohandas K. Gandhi

quotes.message: Man's inhumanity to man makes countless thousands mourn!
quotes.name: Robert Burns

quotes.message: There is no flag large enough to cover the shame of killing innocent people.
quotes.name: Howard Zinn

quotes.message: Washing one's hands of the conflict between the powerful and the powerless means to side with the powerful, not to be neutral.
quotes.name: Paulo Freire

quotes.message: Undeservedly you will atone for the sins of your fathers.
quotes.name: Horace

quotes.message: When one has been threatened with a great injustice, one accepts a smaller as a favor.
quotes.name: Jane Welsh Carlyle

quotes.message: The highest reach of injustice is to be deemed just when you are not.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: National injustice is a sure road to national downfall.
quotes.name: William Ewart Gladstone

quotes.message: Delay in justice is injustice.
quotes.name: Walter Savage Landor

quotes.message: An unrectified case of injustice has a terrible way of lingering, restlessly, in the social atmosphere like an unfinished question.
quotes.name: Mary Mccarthy

quotes.message: A personal injustice is stronger motivation than any instinct for philanthropy.
quotes.name: John Irving

quotes.message: The truth about injustice always sounds outrageous.
quotes.name: James H. Cone

quotes.message: There is a naive belief that injustice only had to be pointed out in order to be cured.
quotes.name: Gloria Steinem

quotes.message: No one will dare maintain that it is better to do injustice than to bear it.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: To do injustice is more disgraceful than to suffer it.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: Injustice is a rule of the service, as you know very well; and since you have to have a good deal of undeserved abuse, you might just as well have it from your friends.
quotes.name: Patrick O'Brian

quotes.message: The struggle against injustice is just another kind of injustice.
quotes.name: Marty Rubin

quotes.message: Injustice is a scar in the surface of the earth and death to the victim soul.
quotes.name: Anayo Ezimuor

quotes.message: When you take a stand against injustice inflicted upon innocent people, there will be those who will hate you for it.
quotes.name: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.message: Injustice alone can shake down the pillars of the skies, and restore the reign of Chaos and Night.
quotes.name: Horace Mann

quotes.message: Everyone suffers some injustice in life, and what better motivation than to help others not suffer in the same way.
quotes.name: Bella Thorne
